name: Tetris For Two (itch)
description:
Controls: 
Player 1: Move with arrows, z or x  to start game or rotate block

Player 2: Move with esdf, start game or rotate block with tab or q

to rotate pieces, one player must push up on the piece and the other down, or left and right! 

highly recommend downloading the cart to change the key configurations!

BEWARE: some bugs with moving pieces when theyre close to the ground, or getting trapped inside pieces. bug fixes soon!
